snippet: In a surprise for train riders, New Jersey Transit said Wednesday that it would restore service by Monday to nearly its entire railroad.
abstract: New Jersey continues its recovery from Hurricane Sandy, and New Jersey Transit issues surprising report that service will be restored within days to nearly the entire railroad, including the North Jersey Coast Line; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart.
lead_paragraph: In a surprise for train riders, New Jersey Transit said Wednesday that it would restore service by Monday to nearly its entire railroad.

headline.seo: Updates to Service Restoration in New Jersey
